item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (192 points | 41 comments)
2. Ease of maintenance is a feature (52 points | 14 comments)
